title: [GAMEPLAY] Nocturne press E before zhonya , you get feared even inside the zhonya
body:
You can see the replay. Considering no other spell has the same interaction , i think it counts as a bug?
Steps to reproduce (if you haven't watched the replay) :
1. Player 1 press E with Nocturne.
2. Player 2 press Zhonya quickly after that.
3. Fear continues to stay on target and fears you inside the zhonya.
4. RIP

replies.body:
I wasn't talking about the tethers themselves. But about the whole fear thing being applied while still in the zhonya. Meaning what should happen imo :
1. The fear is applied before the zhonya ends => negated.
2. Tethers still stay but if applied after the zhonya ends (not sure if the durations even allows this to happen) => fear.
Tethers aren't broken by Zhonya. Thats a known interaction.

{{champion:43}} W
{{champion:25}} R
{{champion:7}} E

Pretty sure these all hit through it too (don't do damage though).  I'm 95% sure this is intended.
